summary: Menu management project: update the menu by removing the breakfast offering.

existing_features.title: Remove the Breakfast category and all Breakfast items from the seed (fallback) menu data so Breakfast never appears when the backend menu is empty.

Ensure the public Menu section does not display Breakfast even if a Breakfast category/items exist in backend data (e.g., legacy/admin-created). Filter out any category named "BREAKFAST" (case-insensitive) and any items belonging to that category before rendering.

new_feature_requests.summary: When an admin deletes a menu category, also delete all menu items that belong to that category in the backend so removing Breakfast fully removes its items as well.
